alert.note: Alert for Holt; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 11:29PM CDT until July 19 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Holt County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1129 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport, or 15 miles east of Bassett, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atkinson, Stuart, Newport and Pony Lake. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 267 and 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
